salaryExpectations: LKR 100,000 (Analyst) to LKR 750,000+ (Head of Supply Chain) per month.
futureOutlook: As a strategic hub, Sri Lanka's logistics and supply chain sector is vital. Professionals who can optimize supply chains, reduce costs, and improve efficiency are in high demand, particularly in the apparel, FMCG, and export industries. Technology and data analytics are playing an increasingly important role in modern supply chain management.
